knobs.name: fertility_and_births
knobs.rationale: BASE_FERTILITY small bump supports builder-forward stability (fewer tithe arrears from shortages) without adding new systems; birth odds/window increased to reduce 30-turn DeathNoHeir.

knobs.name: mortality_base_schedule
knobs.rationale: Reduce child/heir mortality (and slightly reduce overall mortality) so heirs are more likely to survive to succession at 30 turns.

knobs.name: physician_mortality_multiplier
knobs.rationale: Increase Physician's durability impact without changing costs/build system.

knobs.name: arrears_unrest_penalty_per_turn
knobs.rationale: Slightly reduce arrears-driven unrest spiral (secondary: builder-forward stability).

knobs.name: stable_unrest_decay_per_turn
knobs.rationale: Increase steady-state unrest decay when fed + dues current to keep prudent runs in the <=40 band over 30 turns.
